description: Try our easy to follow Barbecue Pork Ribs with Asian Coleslaw recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: BBQ pork,Low saturated fat,High fibre,High protein,Seafood free,Pork,Low sugar,Summer
name: Barbecue Pork Ribs with Asian Coleslaw Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 carrot, peeled, cut into thin sticks

recipeInstructions.text: Place ribs into a large saucepan and cover with cold water. Bring to the boil over high heat. Reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes or until cooked through. Drain and cool.

Combine tomato sauce, honey, sweet chilli sauce, hoisin, lemon juice and garlic in a bowl. Arrange ribs into a large ceramic dish in a single layer. Pour marinade over ribs, turning to coat. Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour or overnight if possible.
Heat a barbecue hotplate on high. Add ribs and cook for 8 mins. Turn and cook for a further 8 mins or until cooked through.
To make coleslaw, combine cabbage, carrot, capsicum, bean sprouts, mint and dressing in a large bowl. Toss until well combined. Serve with Asian coleslaw and bread rolls.
